snippet: The Republican presidential candidate has taken to quoting from patriotic songs, and expounding on their meaning.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney has taken to quoting from patriotic songs during campaign events, and expounding on their meaning.
lead_paragraph: The Republican presidential candidate has taken to quoting from patriotic songs, and expounding on their meaning.

headline.seo: Mitt Romney Waxes Poetic as He Woos Iowa Voters
headline.main: Romney Quotes His Favorite Patriotic Songs and Offers Voters an Interpretation
headline.print_headline: Romney Quotes His Favorite Patriotic Songs and Offers Voters an Interpretation
